description: Owners who face the threat of killer litter have the right to install awnings to protect their units. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: The ugly side of living in condos with killer litter problems
title_page: The ugly side of living in condos with killer litter problems | The Straits Times
maintext:
Imagine living in a condominium where uncivilised residents chuck killer litter such as knife blades, metal poles, glass shards and tennis rackets out of their windows.
These were the nightmarish scenarios some ground-floor residents at a condo had to deal with.
